summary: a few amino-acid changes in the S1 subunit of wild-type IBVS proteins may result in mutants unaffected by current vaccines. 3 isolates of the Moroccan Italy 02 genotype from vaccinated and unvaccinated broiler flocks were found genetically highly distant from known avian IBV. strains in order to rationally modify vaccination strategies to make them appropriate to the evolving field situation.
